body.p: Oracc Early Monumental Cuneiform presently covers all of the Gudea statue inscriptions; the general plan is for this font to cover EMC generally and to have style sets applicable to the more important third (and possibly early second) millennium).
Oracc EMC is an original work by Steve Tinney based wherever possible on photographs of the originals.
Oracc Gudea is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1.
All of the Oracc fonts are downloadable from the Oracc II GitHub repository in the msc/fonts subdirectory.
In Oracc projects the font is selected with the CSS class ofs-ems.
